dialog: Well, in our printing presses, the steam produced is harnessed and used to heat our dryers.
Pray tell, what other sources of energy do you utilize?

Not a single drop of fossil fuel touches our doorstep. The power of our factory is derived from hydro-electric sources, and we have aspirations to utilize even more alternative energy sources, such as wind power, in the future.
Methinks, tea is the most beloved beverage in the world, second only to water.
The love of tea extends from Asia to Europe, it seems.
Indeed, China is the birthplace of tea.
The Chinese are quite fond of their tea, some even claim they cannot live without it.
Might I ask, are you aware of the different categories of Chinese tea?
Of course! Green tea, black tea, and scented tea are all well known. Do you know of any others?
Ah, have you heard of Oolong tea and compressed tea?
Indeed, I have heard Oolong tea is quite beneficial for one's health.
You seem quite the connoisseur of Chinese tea.
Aye, I do enjoy a good cup of tea in the company of friends at a local tea house.
As do I, it seems.
Shall we visit one now?
An excellent idea. We may converse over a cup of tea.
Let us depart!
What would you say are your personal weaknesses?
I fear I am not a gifted speaker, I am quite uncomfortable conversing with strangers. It is not conductive to business, so I have taken up the study of public speaking.
Would you consider yourself a leader or a follower?
